DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To collect outcome measure eye track questionnaire data prior follow group base clinical therapy program determine effectiveness therapy approach . The therapy program aim improve social cognition skill individual find social situation difficult , stressful and/or uncomfortable desire enhance skill require social interaction . Participants : Cohorts individual age 10-69 year old symptoms neurodevelopment disorder , general difficulty social interaction . Procedures : Participants enrol clinical therapy program improvement social cognition skills complete eye track task , several questionnaire rating scale , diagnostic interview prior follow 8 week therapy program . The post treatment assessment conduct within week therapy completion approximately 2 month last therapy session . The entire study duration expect approximately 17 week . These outcome measure measure effectiveness treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between age 1369 . 2 . Symptoms neurodevelopmental disorder . 3 . English primary language ability speak fluent , full length sentence : Treatment conduct group set English . 1 . Inability speak English fluently .
